---
name: Bug report
about: Provide a detailed report on a bug
title: "[RX-TN BUG]"
labels: bug
assignees: cainbryce208

---

***Describe bug in detail***
+ Examples of essential details
    - Describe what the bug does and what was the expected output or function it didn't produce properly
    - How do I reproduce this bug? 
    - Ex:
        - What version was this observed on? 
        - OS? 
        - Browser?
        - Are you running any browser extensions?
        - Can you provide output logs during the time of bug occurring?
+ Please check the following before submitting a report:
    - Your extensions enabled don't have a conflict.
        - Usually when you run your browser in private mode, your extensions will not run. Unless you have specified otherwise.
    - You aren't running any on screen displays or anything that interacts with your browser in any meaningful way
